data.name: STATUS_DESC_ABOUT
data.value: Expand a submenu which propose help or information about the soft.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_ABOUTUS
data.value: Open a popup that gives information about the dev team.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_BUILD
data.value: Expand a submenu which propose to export the project to different locations. Currently only Windows OS are supported.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_BUILDTOWINDOWS
data.value: Expand a submenu which propose to try the game either in a normal mode or a fullscreen mode.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_CIRCLE
data.value: Use the circle tool to draw circles for hidden events or walkable areas.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_COPY
data.value: Copy an object and keep it in memory to be pasted later.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_CREATEMAP
data.value: Open a popup to create a new map.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_CUT
data.value: Delete an object and keep it in memory to be pasted later.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_DATABASE
data.value: Open the database window, which allow you to modify all the game system resources.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_DELETE
data.value: Delete an object.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_DOCUMENT
data.value: Open a documentation to help to get started with the soft.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_DRAWING
data.value: Expand a submenu to choose a tool to draw an hidden event or walkable areas.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_EDITION
data.value: Expand a submenu to do the cut/copy/paste operations.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_EXIT
data.value: Leave the application.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_FILE
data.value: Expand a submenu to manage a project, access to the general settings or leave the application.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_FULLSCREEN_TRY
data.value: Compile the game and launch it in a fullscreen mode.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_GAME
data.value: Expand a submenu which propose to try the game either in a normal mode or a fullscreen mode.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_GENERALSETTINGS
data.value: Open a popup to change some general settings of the application.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_IMPORTMASK
data.value: Open a popup to choose a mask file to import within the current stage.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_INFOPANEL
data.value: Provide informations about the selected object within the stage, or the stage itself if nothing is selected.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_LANGUAGE
data.value: Expand a submenu which propose to change the language

data.name: STATUS_DESC_LAYERSPANEL
data.value: Allow you to create, edit or delete layers for the stage.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_LOAD
data.value: Load a project and all its stages.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE
data.value: Expand a submenu to choose the edition mode for the stage.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE_CHARACTERS
data.value: Change the edition mode for the stage to Characters, which allow you to place character objects. Hidden events and areas are not shown.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE_DECORS
data.value: Change the edition mode for the stage to Decors, which allow you to place decors. Objects, hidden events and areas are not shown.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE_EVENTS
data.value: Change the edition mode for the stage to Events, which allow you to place hidden events. Walkable areas and regions are not shown.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE_OBJECTS
data.value: Change the edition mode for the stage to Objects, which allow you to place animation objects. Hidden events and areas are not shown.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE_REGIONS
data.value: Change the edition mode for the stage to Regions, which allow you to create new areas and set percentage of zoom on characters sprites depending on how far they are from the main region (zoom 100%). Hidden events and walkable areas are not shown.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_MODE_WALKABLE
data.value: Change the edition mode for the stage to Walkable Areas, which allow you to specify where the player character can/can't move. Hidden events and regions are not shown.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_NEW
data.value: Open a popup to create a new project.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_PASTE
data.value: Paste an object that has been kept in memory by a cut/copy action.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_PENCIL
data.value: Use the pencil tool to draw areas for hidden events or walkable areas.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_POINTER
data.value: Use the pointer tool to select pointers made by the pencil, rectangle or circle tool for hidden events or walkable areas.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_PREVIEWPANEL
data.value: Provide a preview of the selected objet in the stage.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_PROJECTPANEL
data.value: Allows you to drag & drop objects to the stage. It also lists all the stage that can be loaded with a double click on a stage name.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_RECTANGLE
data.value: Use the rectangle tool to draw rectangles for hidden events or walkable areas.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_RESOURCES
data.value: Expand a submenu which propose to create a map or access to the Database or the Resources Manager.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_RESOURCESMANAGER
data.value: Open the Resources Manager window, which allow you to import, preview or delete physical resources such as pictures or musics.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_SAVE
data.value: Save a project and all its stages.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_SPRITECREATOR
data.value: Launch the external tool "Sprite Creator" which help creating character animations

data.name: STATUS_DESC_STAGE
data.value: Allows you to manage objects within the stage or add events in it.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_STAGEOBJECTSPANEL
data.value: Provide you a view of all objects in the stage.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_TRY
data.value: Compile the game and launch it in a windowed mode.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_VIEW
data.value: Expand a submenu to manage the windows settings of the application.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_VIEW_LEFT_BAR
data.value: Show/Hide the toolbar on the left.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_VIEW_RIGHT_BAR
data.value: Show/Hide the toolbar on the right.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_VIEW_TOOLBAR
data.value: Show/Hide the toolbar in the menu.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_WEBSITE
data.value: Open the website of Replica Studio.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_ZOOM
data.value: Expand a submenu to choose a zoom to apply to the stage edition.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_ZOOM11
data.value: Apply a zoom of 100% to the stage edition.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_ZOOM12
data.value: Apply a zoom of 200% to the stage edition.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_ZOOM14
data.value: Apply a zoom of 400% to the stage edition.

data.name: STATUS_DESC_ZOOM18
data.value: Apply a zoom of 800% to the stage edition.

data.name: TERM_CHOICENEXT
data.value: Next

data.name: TERM_CHOICEPREVIOUS
data.value: Previous

data.name: TERM_LEAVEGAME
data.value: Leave Game

data.name: TERM_LOADGAME
data.value: Load Game

data.name: TERM_NEWGAME
data.value: New Game

data.name: TERM_OPTIONS
data.value: Options

data.name: TERM_RETURNTITLE
data.value: Return to title screen

data.name: TERM_SAVEGAME
data.value: Save Game

data.name: TERM_SAVESTATE
data.value: Save State
